subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Rex Grossman, putting together the best drive of his career, popped open a tight game in the fourth quarter and sparked the Bears to a victory over the Saints in the N.F.C. championship game.
snippet: Rex Grossman, putting together the best drive of his career, popped open a tight game in the fourth quarter and sparked the Bears to a victory over the Saints in the N.F.C. championship game.
